attributes.action: To stop awarding government contracts to companies who are making UK workers redundant while shipping their jobs overseas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a company is making UK workers redundant and at the same time shipping their jobs overseas (e.g. India).  Those companies should not be awarded any government contracts, as those companies are already costing the UK economy money in un-employment benefits, and they should not be rewarded for the damage they are doing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
